dublin_core.dcvalue: Mobile phone hotline that increases knowledge and use of modern contraceptive methods among reproductive-aged women and their partners
La Ligne Verte Family Planning Hotline Maternal Health (Antenatal and Postnatal Care)
Nestor Ankiba, Country Representative, PSI/ASF | Tel: +243-990-030-029, email: nankiba@psicongo.org
Democratic Republic of the Congo (8 of 11 provinces)
La Ligne Verte Family Planning Hotline
Client education and behavior change communication, Family Planning
